tasks.name: Add `SynthesisAgentDefinitionYaml` interface to types.ts with fields matching `AgentDefinitionYaml` structure (name, description, best_for, models)
tasks.report: Added SynthesisAgentDefinitionYaml interface to types.ts with matching structure to AgentDefinitionYaml

tasks.name: Extend `AgentsConfigYaml` interface to include optional `synthesis_agents?: SynthesisAgentDefinitionYaml[]` field
tasks.report: Extended AgentsConfigYaml interface with optional synthesis_agents?: SynthesisAgentDefinitionYaml[] field

tasks.name: Add `synthesisOutput?: string` field to `ThreadMetadata` interface for storing synthesis summaries
tasks.report: Added synthesisOutput?: string field to ThreadMetadata with JSDoc documentation

tasks.name: Add `workingAgentSessionId?: string` field to `ThreadMetadata` to track the working agent's opencode session separately from the outer synthesis session
tasks.report: Added workingAgentSessionId?: string field to ThreadMetadata with JSDoc documentation

tasks.name: Add JSDoc comments explaining the distinction between `opencodeSessionId` (outermost agent), `workingAgentSessionId` (inner working agent), and `currentSessionId` (internal tracking)
tasks.report: Added comprehensive JSDoc comments explaining opencodeSessionId (outermost agent), workingAgentSessionId (inner working agent), and currentSessionId (internal tracking)

tasks.name: Extend `parseAgentsYaml()` function in agents-yaml.ts to parse the `synthesis_agents` array from agents.yaml
tasks.report: Extended parseAgentsYaml() to parse synthesis_agents array with same model validation logic. Added getSynthesisAgent(), getDefaultSynthesisAgent(), listSynthesisAgents(), and getSynthesisAgentModels() functions in agents-yaml.ts.

tasks.name: Add `getSynthesisAgent(name: string)` function to retrieve a synthesis agent by name, returning null if not found
tasks.report: Extended parseAgentsYaml() to parse synthesis_agents array with same model validation logic. Added getSynthesisAgent(), getDefaultSynthesisAgent(), listSynthesisAgents(), and getSynthesisAgentModels() functions in agents-yaml.ts.

tasks.name: Add `getDefaultSynthesisAgent()` function to return the first synthesis agent from config or null if none defined
tasks.report: Extended parseAgentsYaml() to parse synthesis_agents array with same model validation logic. Added getSynthesisAgent(), getDefaultSynthesisAgent(), listSynthesisAgents(), and getSynthesisAgentModels() functions in agents-yaml.ts.

tasks.name: Apply the same model validation logic used for regular agents to synthesis agent models
tasks.report: Extended parseAgentsYaml() to parse synthesis_agents array with same model validation logic. Added getSynthesisAgent(), getDefaultSynthesisAgent(), listSynthesisAgents(), and getSynthesisAgentModels() functions in agents-yaml.ts.

tasks.name: Create directory and file at `~/.config/opencode/skills/synthesizing-workstreams/SKILL.md`

tasks.name: Locate `--max-count 10` in `buildRunCommand()` function in opencode.ts and change to `--max-count 20`
tasks.report: Changed --max-count from 10 to 20 in buildRunCommand() at line 192 in opencode.ts

tasks.name: Locate `--max-count 10` in `buildRetryRunCommand()` function in opencode.ts and change to `--max-count 20`
tasks.report: Changed --max-count from 10 to 20 in buildRetryRunCommand() at line 325 in opencode.ts

tasks.name: Run existing tests to verify the changes don't break session listing functionality
tasks.report: Ran test suite with bun run test - all 514 tests pass. Verified changes don't break session listing functionality.

tasks.name: Add `getSynthesisOutputPath(streamId: string, threadId: string)` helper function returning `/tmp/workstream-{streamId}-{threadId}-synthesis.txt`
tasks.report: Added getSynthesisOutputPath() and getWorkingAgentSessionPath() helper functions in opencode.ts for tracking synthesis output and working agent sessions

tasks.name: Create `buildSynthesisRunCommand()` function that internally calls `buildRetryRunCommand()` and wraps it with synthesis agent execution
tasks.report: Created buildSynthesisRunCommand() function in opencode.ts that wraps buildRetryRunCommand() logic with synthesis agent orchestration

tasks.name: Generate unique tracking IDs for both synthesis and working agents within the command builder
tasks.report: Generate unique tracking IDs: SYNTH_TRACK_ID for synthesis agent, WORK_TRACK_ID for working agent, using date +%s%N for uniqueness

tasks.name: Construct the synthesis prompt that instructs the synthesis agent to run the working agent command, wait for completion, then summarize
tasks.report: Synthesis prompt via buildSynthesisPrompt() instructs agent to: 1) execute working agent command, 2) capture session ID, 3) summarize results to output file

tasks.name: Add error handling for synthesis agent failure that still captures working agent session ID if available
tasks.report: Error handling: falls back to working agent session if synthesis fails, always writes completion marker, initializes output files on start

tasks.name: Add `setWorkingAgentSessionId(repoRoot, streamId, threadId, sessionId)` function to threads.ts
tasks.report: Added setWorkingAgentSessionId() function to threads.ts that stores the working agent session ID via updateThreadMetadata()

tasks.name: Add `getWorkingAgentSessionId(repoRoot, streamId, threadId)` function to threads.ts
tasks.report: Added getWorkingAgentSessionId() function to threads.ts that retrieves the working agent session ID from thread metadata

tasks.name: Update the session close handler in multi.ts to capture and store both synthesis and working agent session IDs
tasks.report: Updated handleSessionClose in multi.ts to capture both opencodeSessionId and workingAgentSessionId from temp files. Uses getWorkingAgentSessionPath() for the working agent session.

tasks.name: Ensure `work fix --resume` uses `workingAgentSessionId` when available, falling back to `opencodeSessionId`
tasks.report: Updated executeResume in fix.ts to use workingAgentSessionId when available, falling back to opencodeSessionId, then lastSession.sessionId. Added session source logging for clarity.

tasks.name: Load synthesis agent config using `getDefaultSynthesisAgent()` in multi.ts main function
tasks.report: Added imports for getDefaultSynthesisAgent and getSynthesisAgentModels to multi.ts, and calling getDefaultSynthesisAgent to load synthesis config

tasks.name: Add conditional logic to use `buildSynthesisRunCommand()` instead of `buildRetryRunCommand()` when synthesis agent exists
tasks.report: Created buildThreadRunCommand helper that conditionally uses buildSynthesisRunCommand when thread has synthesisModels, falls back to buildRetryRunCommand

tasks.name: Extend `ThreadInfo` interface in collectThreadInfoFromTasks to include optional `synthesisAgentName` and `synthesisModels` fields
tasks.report: Added synthesisAgentName and synthesisModels optional fields to ThreadInfo interface in types.ts

tasks.name: Update `setupTmuxSession()` to handle synthesis-wrapped commands
tasks.report: Updated setupTmuxSession and setupGridController to use buildThreadRunCommand which handles synthesis mode automatically

tasks.name: Verify session close handler correctly stores working agent session ID to threads.json
tasks.report: Verified handleSessionClose correctly reads working agent session from temp file and stores to threads.json via updateThreadMetadataLocked with workingAgentSessionId field

tasks.name: Modify `handleSessionClose()` in multi.ts to read synthesis output from temp file using `getSynthesisOutputPath()`
tasks.report: Implemented synthesis output capture in handleSessionClose(): reads from temp file using getSynthesisOutputPath(), stores in threads.json via updateThreadMetadataLocked(), logs warnings for empty/missing files, and added cleanupSynthesisFiles() in marker-polling.ts for cleanup.

tasks.name: Call `updateThreadMetadataLocked()` with synthesisOutput field after reading the temp file
tasks.report: Implemented synthesis output capture in handleSessionClose(): reads from temp file using getSynthesisOutputPath(), stores in threads.json via updateThreadMetadataLocked(), logs warnings for empty/missing files, and added cleanupSynthesisFiles() in marker-polling.ts for cleanup.

tasks.name: Add warning logging for empty or missing synthesis output files without failing the thread
tasks.report: Implemented synthesis output capture in handleSessionClose(): reads from temp file using getSynthesisOutputPath(), stores in threads.json via updateThreadMetadataLocked(), logs warnings for empty/missing files, and added cleanupSynthesisFiles() in marker-polling.ts for cleanup.

tasks.name: Add cleanup logic for synthesis output temp files in marker-polling.ts
tasks.report: Implemented synthesis output capture in handleSessionClose(): reads from temp file using getSynthesisOutputPath(), stores in threads.json via updateThreadMetadataLocked(), logs warnings for empty/missing files, and added cleanupSynthesisFiles() in marker-polling.ts for cleanup.

tasks.name: Add private `queue: string[]` array and `isPlaying: boolean` flag to MacOSSoundProvider class

Implement `playNext()` private method to play the next sound from queue when current sound finishes
Hook into afplay's exit event to trigger `playNext()` for sequential sound playback
Write unit tests for the sound queue to verify sequential playback behavior
Add new `thread_synthesis_complete` event type to NotificationEvent type definition
Add optional `metadata` parameter to `playNotification()` method for passing synthesis output
Extend `WebhookPayload` interface to include optional `synthesisOutput` field
Update `NotificationTracker` to accept and pass through synthesis data to providers
Add `playSynthesisComplete(threadId: string, synthesisOutput: string)` helper method to NotificationManager
Update synthesizing-workstreams SKILL.md with complete usage instructions and examples
Add JSDoc comments to new functions in agents-yaml.ts (getSynthesisAgent, getDefaultSynthesisAgent, parseAgentsYaml changes)
Add JSDoc comments to new functions in opencode.ts (buildSynthesisRunCommand, getSynthesisOutputPath)
Add JSDoc comments to new functions in threads.ts (setWorkingAgentSessionId, getWorkingAgentSessionId)
Document the agents.yaml schema for synthesis_agents section with example configuration in code comments
